name: Countess
description: The Countess is worth +2 points if you also have the Count in your score pile.

name: Lord
description: Draw an additional action card at the end of your turn after you collect this noble.

name: Lady in Waiting
description: Draw an additional action card at the end of your turn after you collect this noble.

name: Lady
description: Draw an additional action card at the end of your turn after you collect this noble.

name: Count
description: The Count is worth +2 points if you also have the Countess in you score pile.

name: Robespierre
description: The day ends after you collect this noble. Discard any nobles remaining in line.

name: General
description: Add another noble from the noble deck to the end of the line after you collect this noble.

name: Master Spy
description: After each action card is played, move this card to the end of the line.

name: Palace Guard
description: Each Palace Guard is worth a number of points equal to the number of Palace Guards in your score pile (including this one).

name: Palace Guard
description: Each Palace Guard is worth a number of points equal to the number of Palace Guards in your score pile (including this one).

name: Palace Guard
description: Each Palace Guard is worth a number of points equal to the number of Palace Guards in your score pile (including this one).

name: Palace Guard
description: Each Palace Guard is worth a number of points equal to the number of Palace Guards in your score pile (including this one).

name: Palace Guard
description: Each Palace Guard is worth a number of points equal to the number of Palace Guards in your score pile (including this one).

name: Captain of the Guard
description: Add another noble from the noble deck to the end of the line after you collect this noble.

name: Unpopular Judge
description: No player may play an action card while the Unpopular Judge is at the front of the line.

name: Unpopular Judge
description: No player may play an action card while the Unpopular Judge is at the front of the line.

name: Rival Executioner
description: Collect the top noble of the noble deck after you collect this noble.

name: The Clown
description: When you collect this noble, place it in another player's score pile.

name: Innocent Victim
description: Choose an action card from your hand and discard it after you collect this noble.

name: Tragic Figure
description: This noble is worth -1 point for every Gray noble in your score pile (including this one).
